projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Built a portfolio page using React and Tailwind in the front end, created a Node server to host images, descriptions and other information, this should increase performance and also allow for easier updates when I create more projects, or just wish to change various images and icons on the page. I decided to use Tailwind since it was relatively new to me and it looked enjoyable- it was!

projects.name: Cleaner CRA
projects.description: Cleaner-Create-React-App is a script that removes unnecessary files that are generated when creating a React app using create-react-app. To achieve this I used Node.js.

projects.name: The Score Industry Project
projects.description: TheScore introduced an intriguing challenge space, where diverse groups comprising Software Engineers, UX/UI designers, and Data Scientists collaborated to devise innovative solutions. With a limited timeframe of 24 hours, our goal was to create a compelling solution tailored to enhance user engagement and retention for the 'bet' feature within TheScore's mobile app. Our solution was to add a 'demo' to help users learn what betting is, the risks involved, and allow them to place a practice bet.
